name: San Francisco Nutrition Services
description: As a section of the Pregnancy and Maternal Health Branch of the San Francisco Department of Public Health (SFDPH), San Francisco Women, Infant, and Children (WIC) promotes healthy living to the diverse communities of San Francisco though: - Education - Medical nutrition therapy - Nutrition resources - Support and referral
